arts.ttl: Arne Slot calls for new VAR experiment after Tottenham star Lucas Bergvall avoids red card
arts.sum: Liverpool manager Arne Slot believes referee Stuart Atwell should explain why Tottenham matchwinner Lucas Bergvall was not sent off before scoring late on against the Reds

arts.ttl: Three reasons Ange Postecoglou was WRONG about Lucas Bergvall decision vs Liverpool
arts.sum: Tottenham star Lucas Bergvall was fortunate not to be sent off just minutes before he scored the only goal as Spurs took a first-leg lead in their Carabao Cup semi-final against Liverpool

arts.ttl: Bravery of Tottenham tyros breathes life back into Angeball | Jacob Steinberg
arts.athr: Jacob Steinberg at the Tottenham Hotspur Stadium
arts.sum: Archie Gray and Antonin Kinsky lead the way in defeat of Liverpool to give Ange Postecoglou hope for the future A hard-earned, robust, counterpunching 1-0 win against the team who put six past us last month? It‚Äôs just who we are, mate. It is of course classic Angeball to kick and hassle opponents into errors, to irritate and snarl in midfield, and to find a ruthless edge just when it seemed that the first leg of this Carabao Cup semi-final was beginning to turn Liverpool‚Äôs way following the introduction of Trent Alexander-Arnold, Luis D√≠az and Darwin N√∫√±ez after an hour of surprising ineptitude from the Premier League leaders. This was a different Tottenham Hotspur from the one that collapsed against Arne Slot‚Äôs team 17 days ago. Implausibly, with Cristian Romero and Micky van de Ven still missing in central defence, there was snap and aggression from start to finish. There was Yves Bissouma, who walked a tightrope after an early booking, finding it within himself to dominate Liverpool‚Äôs midfield. There was Djed Spence filling in for Destiny Udogie and keeping Mohamed Salah quiet. And there was, perhaps only fleetingly, a sense that life remains in the Ange Postecoglou project, no matter how precarious it has felt for much of a trying campaign. Continue reading...

arts.ttl: Carabao Cup offers lifeline for Postecoglou and Spurs to cling to
arts.sum: After what has been a challenging month for Ange Postecoglou, the prospect of a cup final may just be focal point that Spurs and their under-pressure boss so desperately need.

arts.ttl: 'Bergvall is headline act as young Spurs show incredible maturity'
arts.sum: Tottenham's trio of young stars give Postecoglou the perfect tonic with Carabao Cup semi-final win against Liverpool.
